settings.heading: Do you accept international orders?
settings.row_content: At this time we only ship to Canadian and US addresses.

settings.heading: What are the shipping fees?
settings.row_content: At checkout, you can choose between regular shipping or Canada Post Expedited Parcel. Regular shipping fees are calculated at checkout, depending on the size of the package and the shipping destination. We offer a flat shipping rate for remote areas. Canada Post Expedited Parcel shipping fees are also calculated at checkout, depending on the size of the package and the shipping destination.

settings.heading: What is the minimum order value to get free shipping?
settings.row_content: Free shipping is automatically applied to every $80+ orders (before taxes, after discount).

settings.heading: How long does shipping take?
settings.row_content:
It usually takes 1 to 5 business days for our team to prepare your online order. Please note that during sales or promotions, process time may be longer than expected.

You should receive your order within 3-10 business day(s) after shipping confirmation depending on the delivery company chosen at checkout.
